code: import{useMemo}from"react";import{useLocation}from"react-router-dom";import options from"../components/Logo/options";export var useDynamicColour=function useDynamicColour(){var _useLocation=useLocation(),pathname=_useLocation.pathname;var urlObject=options.find(function(_ref){var urls=_ref.urls,color=_ref.color;return urls.find(function(url){return url===pathname;});});return{dynamicColour:urlObject&&urlObject.color?urlObject.color:"#c6cbe1"};};
